summary: This mod replace female shape and textures into a more muscular one. Nords and Orcs or All races. Now comes with converted armours.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://imageshack.us/a/img803/6715/mwlogo.png[/img][/center]



Version: 3.0
Date: 02/24/2013
Category: Models and Textures
Requirements: Skyrim
Recommended: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32521]Muscular Women - Armours[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=44]Female Muscle Mod[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=171]Female Idle Animation Swap[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]Xenius Character Enhancement[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29476]Pumping Iron[/url]
Author: Elmanouche
Contributor : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/161571]wysiwyg[/url]




[size=5][color=orange]Notice![/color][/size]

I have separated Armours from Body.

Armours can be found here :
[center][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32521]Muscular Women - Armours[/url][/size][/center]

I've converted Sleek Steel, it can be found here :
[center][size=4][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33644]Muscular Women - SleekSteel[/url][/size][/center]


[size=3][color=orange]UPDATE ![/color][/size]
New LITE version, for low end GPU. 1k uncompressed muscle textures. The difference is barely noticeable.


[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img541/8734/whatsnew30.png[/img]

Complete rework of the mesh and shape.
Less "enormous" pecs.
Better forearms, fitting muscle tone textures.
Less "tree trunks" legs, with more curves.
Thinner hips.
Modelised nipples, even on _0.
More feminine and "skinny" _0, very thin waist.
Fully working weight slider.
New underwear, based on UNP bikini

All normal maps have been edited and tweaked to reduce seam.
Some might still appear at ankles with Hardcore muscles.


Muscle Definition plugin : muscle tone according to weight



[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/4673/upcomingu.png[/img]

[list][*][b][color=teal][/color][/b][/*]
[/list]
Note : 1 mesh = _0.nif + _1.nif



[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img706/4134/descriptiono.png[/img]

Some of us always thought that Nords and Orcs women needed a more beefy look, their descriptions depicting them as muscular and strong.
And with that thought, Tigersan released an awesome muscle texture. So now comes the body shape to complete the set.



[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img600/7569/conversions.png[/img]

[size=3][b][color=silver]Armours[/color][/b][/size]
[list][*][color=orange][b]Bandit armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Dragonbone armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Dragonscale armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Dwarven armor - revealing only[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Elven armor - revealing only[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Ebony armor + revealing[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Glass armor + revealing[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Hide/leather armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Imperial armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Iron armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Nightingale armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Nordplate armor + revealing[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Orcish armor + revealing[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Savior's Hide[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Steel Armor + revealing[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Stormcloak and city guards armor.[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Studded armor[/b][/color][/*]
[/list]
[size=3][b][color=silver]Clothes[/color][/b][/size]
[list][*][color=orange][b]Barkeeper robes[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Blacksmith apron[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Fineclothes01[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Fineclothes02[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Forsworn armor[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Mage Apprentice[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Mage Journeyman[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Minerclothes[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Monk[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Nocturnal dress[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Prisoner's clothes[/b][/color][/*]
[*][color=orange][b]Wench outfit - tavern's robes[/b][/color][/*]
[/list]




[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img856/3778/detailsr.png[/img]

This mod is a race specific body replacer, for Nords and Orcs and female only.
They will look muscled, with strong arms and legs, large shoulders and back.

It has a working weight slider : @ 0, it is a feminine female body shape, skinny, looking skinny ripped with Tigersan's textures.
The weight slider affects : shoulders, traps, arms, back, legs, pecs, breasts (slightly) and butt (slightly).

There options to make it all race and work like a standard replacer, for body and armours. As well as several skin textures and muscle tone to play with.

It supports Phygit's Femfeet, and is provided with it. And comes with HD normal maps.

I strongly recommend the use of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29476]Pumping Iron[/url] mod with Muscle Definition plugin, and start a fresh game at weight 0. You'll enjoy watch her grow ;)



[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img259/8527/installp.png[/img]

[size=3][b][color=silver]Install[/color][/b][/size]
Via NMM (recommended)
1. Add [b][color=orange]Muscular Women[/color][/b] mod to NMM, by clicking [b][color=orange]Download with manager[/color][/b] button or [b][color=orange]Add mod from file[/color][/b] in NMM.
2. Activate [b][color=orange]Muscular Women[/color][/b] and choose your options in the scripted installation.
3. play o/


[size=3][b][color=silver]Uninstall[/color][/b][/size]
Simply deactivate both mods in NMM.


[size=3][b][color=silver]Patch install[/color][/b][/size]
No patch available.



[size=3][b][color=silver]Manual Install[/color][/b][/size]
For manual installation, please read the README provided in the readme tab of this mod page.
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img248/9012/readmei.png[/img]




[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img823/9805/issues.png[/img]

Incompatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]

Not compatible with CBBE textures.


Here is a list of issues I'm aware of :
[list][*]Femfeet support is not perfect with Hardcore muscle textures, a seam is still visible above ankle.[/*]
[*]Weight slider : some jaggedness appear between 30 to 60 weight, can't change that[/*]
[/list]


If you have any issue not listed above or need help with custom installation please go on the Support thread found here :
[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img32/6742/supportvh.png[/img]



[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img268/4959/othern.png[/img]

Here are listed the armours/mods based on Muscular Women :
[size=3]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33644]Muscular Women - SleekSteel[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13432]Avalon Armor by Perraine[/url]
[/size]


[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img29/2729/creditsh.png[/img]

Thanks to [b][color=orange]Bethesda[/color][/b] for creating [b][color=silver]Skyrim[/color][/b].
Thanks to [b][color=orange]Skyrim Nexus[/color][/b] for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to [b][color=orange]Tigersan[/color][/b] for the [b][color=silver]muscle textures[/color][/b] this mod is based on. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44]Female Muscle Mod[/url]
Thanks to [b][color=orange]Bingles[/color][/b] for his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8353]Bingles buff female armours[/url].
Thanks to [b][color=orange]Xenius[/color][/b] for his body textures. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
Thanks to [b][color=orange]humannature66[/color][/b] for his [b][color=silver]tanned textures[/color][/b] and [b][color=silver]soft muscle[/color][/b] effect. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25461]HN66s Litheria - Race - Body - Armors[/url]
Thanks to [b][color=orange]yllib[/color][/b] for the [b][color=silver]bronze odd shine fix[/color][/b]. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29791]No more ugly bronze shine[/url]
Thanks to [b][color=orange]zzjay[/color][/b] for his female head [b][color=silver]HD normal map[/color][/b]. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20483]Women of Skyrim-Enhanced female normalmaps[/url]
Thanks to [b][color=orange]Phygit[/color][/b] for his femfeet everyone uses. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666]FemFeet[/url]
Thanks to [b][color=orange]wysiwyg[/color][/b] for the help and support he provided.



[img]http://imageshack.us/a/img850/9095/toolsn.png[/img]

Creation Kit
Blender 2.49b
Nifscope 1.1.3
Photoshop CS5
The Gimp
One Note 2007
FO3 Archive Utility


[b]Licensing/Legal[/b]
===============

You can do anything with this, just credit me and let me know, even more if you want to convert or create armor for it, so I can link to your mod here.
DON'T upload this mod on Steam Workshop or any other modding community.
